titleStmt.title: Gesta Britannorum, or, A brief chronologie of the actions and exploits, battails, sieges, conflicts, and other signal and remarkable passages which have happened in these His Majesties dominions from the year of Christ 1600, untill the present, 1663, being the space of 62 complete years / collected by Geo. Wharton.
titleStmt.author: Wharton, George, Sir, 1617-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
